title: What are some unknown facts about the Indian King Sri Krishna Deva Raya? - Quora

response.answer_text: He used to drink sesame seed oil obtained by squeezing the seeds in his fist. He suffered chicken pox disease in early childhood and had the spots life long. He got made the heaviest cannon of his times with help of the Portuguese. The weapon was known as "Sarabha salva'. He did not patronise the eight Telugu poets collectively known as Ashtadiggajas. Only four of the poets were in his court and one of them left to devote himself to a life of piety. Before leaving, he had to his credit an erotic kavya. The poet Tenali Ramakrishna (wrongly referred as Ramalinga) was a young boy when Krishnadevaraya died, and he was not a court jester. He however posthumously dedicated his book 'panduranga Mahatyam' to Krishnadevaraya.
